data.name: X-Plane 10 AddOn - FunnerFlight - KLAX - Los Angeles International
data.detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


Los Angeles International Airport is the largest international airport on the U.S. West Coast. It is a major gateway to Europe, Latin America and Asia.

In 2015 KLAX handled nearly 75 million passengers, making it the seventh busiest airport by passenger traffic in the world. By aircraft movements Los Angeles Airport was number 3 in the world busiest airports.

After more than 15 month of hard work FunnerFlight now released KLAX for X-Plane. It’s one of the most detailed custom airport you will find in the X-Plane world.

Features:
  • Detailed representation of the airport with all buildings and airport facilities
  • More than 1300 objects are included
  • ATC taxi routes and 4 runways with Wind rules
  • Over 100 Animations, most using GroundTraffic by Marginal.
  • Dozens of gates with Marginal`s Safegate Docking System
  • About 20 sq mi photo realistic ground textures based on aerial images (0,3m/pixel)
  • X-Plane or ortho-texture terminal taxiway option
  • Day and Night textures

data.short_description: Los Angeles International Airport is the largest international airport on the U.S. West Coast. It is a major gateway to Europe, Latin America and Asia.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: IMPORTANT NOTE: KLAX – Los Angeles International is a heavy scenery and requires a modern powerfull computer.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or older
  • Processor: Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: IMPORTANT NOTE: KLAX – Los Angeles International is a heavy scenery and requires a modern powerfull computer.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or older
  • Processor: Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: IMPORTANT NOTE: KLAX – Los Angeles International is a heavy scenery and requires a modern powerfull computer. You must install OpenSceneryX (Link: http://www.opensceneryx.com/)
